column1: 3: Games, lawn games, board games, sports games.
4: Entrance way, As in going into a garden, Church or Cemetery. Or any building.
5: Sculptures, any Material as in sand stone vegetation.
6: American Flag. The flag must be the main theme of the picture.
9: Fields, Acreage, as in crops or hay or orchards. A lawn is not a field unless it is a full acre.
10: Family, This can be people or animals.
11: Transportation, Anything that conveys something from point A to point B. It can be people or freight.
